author: John Haltiwanger
title: Dr. Fauci said he would never call coronavirus the 'Chinese virus,' which Trump insists on doing
description: President Donald Trump has repeatedly referred to the novel coronavirus as the "Chinese virus." Anthony Fauci, the US's top expert on infectious disease, on Sunday said he'd never use this phrase to describe the virus. Critics say the president has only begun…
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci, the nation's top expert on infectious disease, on Sunday he would never refer to the novel coronavirus as the "Chinese virus."
As President Donald Trump has sought to rewrite the history of his early response to the coronavirus pandemic, h… [+3971 chars]
